sentences.english: The needle has jumped several grooves.
Remove the arm from its rest, being careful not to damage the stylus tips.
sentences.chinese: 將唱臂叢支架中移出來，但小心不要損壞了唱針。

sentences.english: The needle moves along the groove on a record.
sentences.chinese: 唱針沿著唱片表面的細紋移動。

sentences.english: Replacing the needle of your record player can improve the sound quality drastically.
sentences.chinese: 更換電唱機上的唱針可以大大改善它的音質。

sentences.english: So weird I could hear the stylus etching its way into the flat vinyl of the record.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪到我似乎能夠聽到留聲機的唱針劃過唱片的聲音。

sentences.english: The stylus is traveling in a groove.
sentences.chinese: 唱針正循着唱片紋路移動。

sentences.english: She took the needle off the record and turned the lights out.
sentences.chinese: 她把唱針從唱片上移開，把燈也關了。

sentences.english: And the gramophone needle is not as good as a used toothpick.
sentences.chinese: 唱針也不如用過的牙籤好幾多。
